definition: phagocyte (cell that ingests and destroys foreign matter)
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
microphage (a type of white blood cell)

sentences.english: When we get an infection, white blood cells called phagocytes leap into action.
sentences.chinese: 人感染時，機體的白細球吞噬細胞行動起來消除感染。

sentences.english: The production and deployment of phagocytes are central functions of the hematopoietic system.
sentences.chinese: 吞噬細胞產物和鋪開是造血系統的中央職能。

sentences.english: In addition, many phagocytes have other specialized functions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，許多吞噬細胞還有其他專門的功能。

sentences.english: The sensitivity with which phagocytes reflect these conditions varies from species to species.
sentences.chinese: 吞噬細胞對這些情況的敏感性在物種間有很大差異。

sentences.english: Objective For elucidating the effect of high dose selenium on phagocytic function of phagocyte in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高硒對小鼠吞噬細胞的影響。

sentences.english: Lymphatic and mononuclear phagocyte system is the body of the second line of defense.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴和單核吞噬細胞系統是機體的第二道防線。

sentences.english: At that time, they will be mononuclear phagocyte system barriers blocking.
sentences.chinese: 這時，它們會受到單核吞噬細胞系統屏障的阻擋。
